title: Establishes an intergenerational educational and mentoring service program to provide assistance to students in elementary schools
summary: Establishes an intergenerational educational and mentoring service program in the state office for the aging to provide assistance by persons age 55 or older to students in elementary schools; details grant funding, based on appropriations; describes reporting requirements.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the elder law, in relation to establishing an intergenerational educational and mentoring service program
